required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Wakame and Spirulina Consumption on Intestinal Cholesterol Absorption in Non- Hypercholesterolemic Men and Women

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to investigate the effects of wakame and spirulina consumption on intestinal cholesterol absorption.

detailed_description.textblock:
Objectives:
Secondary objectives are to investigate the effects of wakame and spirulina consumption on fasting markers for lipid metabolism, glucose metabolism and blood pressure.
Study design:
This study is a double-blinded, randomized, placebo-controlled, crossover intervention trial consisting of three intervention periods of 17 days each, separated by a minimum washout period of 14 days.
Study population:
The study population will consist of 37 healthy, non-hypercholesterolemic men and women aged between 18 and 70 years.
Intervention:
All subjects will receive wakame, spirulina and placebo capsules in randomized order. Subjects will be asked to consume 12 capsules per day for 17 days, which is equal to 4.8 grams of wakame or spirulina a day.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Difference in outcomes between interventions and control at 17 days
primary_outcome.description: Serum cholesterol-standardized campesterol concentrations will be measured as a marker for intestinal cholesterol absorption

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Difference in outcomes between interventions and control at 17 days
secondary_outcome.description: Several markers for fasting lipid metabolism, including total cholesterol, LDL cholesterol and HDL cholesterol, will be measured in blood samples

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Difference in outcomes between interventions and control at 17 days
secondary_outcome.description: Serum cholesterol-standardized lathosterol and desmosterol concentrations will be measured as a markers for cholesterol synthesis

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Difference in outcomes between interventions and control at 17 days
secondary_outcome.description: Fasting plasma glucose concentrations will be determined

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Difference in outcomes between interventions and control at 17 days
secondary_outcome.description: Systolic and diastolic blood pressure will be determined

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive capsules containing wakame
Subjects will receive capsules containing spirulina
Subjects will receive capsules containing microcrystalline cellulose

intervention.description: Consumption of 4.8 grams wakame per day for 17 days
Consumption of 4.8 grams spirulina per day for 17 days
Consumption of microcrystalline cellulose for 17 days
